entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: SE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
